Method Detail

getScope

public Scope getScope()
Description copied from interface: Control.ViewModel
Provides the scope of this control. The latter can be used to uniquely identify the control's location in the internal hierarchy of current Aranea.

Specified by:
getScope in interface Control.ViewModel
Returns:
The scope object of this control.

Provides the control's type, which is basically the control's simple class name.

Specified by:

isMandatory

public boolean isMandatory()
Description copied from interface: Control.ViewModel
Provides whether filling in this control with a non-empty value is mandatory for the user to reach a valid form.

Specified by:
isMandatory in interface Control.ViewModel
Returns:
A boolean that is true when this control is mandatory.

public String getLabel()
Description copied from interface: Control.ViewModel

Specified by:
getLabel in interface Control.ViewModel
Returns:
The control's label ID.

isDisabled

public boolean isDisabled()
Description copied from interface: Control.ViewModel
Provides whether this control is disabled. Disabled controls do not process incoming requests.

Specified by:
isDisabled in interface Control.ViewModel
Returns:
A boolean that is true when this control is disabled.
